item.description:
131 Amory St. Manchester NH
[Description]
10 and on, delicious breakfast by Gail Domenico (see separate event)

11:00 - 12:30

* Bradley Jardis, encounters with police (30 minutes)
* Brandon Ross, activism/civil disobedience in the courts (10 minutes)
* Jeremy Olson, deliberative session in Grafton (10 minutes)
* Rep. Emily Sandblade (10 minutes)
Announcements

Please invite new movers and your friends.

Thank you William and Ofer for sharing the Quill with us!
item.name: March MVP - Pro-liberty community get together
